import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' import '../css/App.css' import { Row, Col } from 'react-grid-system' import Header from './layout/Header' const IMG_BASE_URL = "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/" const MovieDetails = () => { const location = useLocation() const [country, setCountry] = useState([]); // Get genres useEffect(() => { axios.get(genresUrl) .then(res => { setGenres(res.data.genres) }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) }, []); return (

{location.state.original_title}

({location.state.release_date.slice(0, 4)})

  • {location.state.vote_average}

  • / {location.state.vote_count} votes

  • Popularity: {Math.round(location.state.popularity)}

{location.state.original_language}

) } export default MovieDetails
